title: LiveSmart Admin Dashboard
name: Name
left_blank_changed: (If left blank will not be changed)
diable_audio_video: Attendees will start audio and video disabled
diable_audio_video_info: Enable this if you plan a streaming session with more attendees
host_only_action: Only host can allow video or audio in a meeting
host_only_action_info: If the attendee is with his video or audio off, only host can enable them
room_info:
You can start a video conference or a broadcasting session from the buttons bellow. The organizer URL will be opened in a new tab and the visitor URL will be stored in your clipboard.
You can choose settings for the new video/broadcast from the left pane.
config_screen_info: If enabled, it starts a screenshare session. The stream will be saved as a recording
config_agent_name_info: If specified it will appear in your visitor video and chat panels as default host name
config_language_info: Used locales can be set or edited in Locales section
config_localfeedmirrored: Local video feed is shown as mirrored
config_exitmeetingontimeagent: Meeting auto stops for agents/organizers too
config_exitmeetingontime: Meeting is auto stopped on time end
config_exitmeetingontime_info: When a meeting has a duration and if this is enabled, upon time expiration meeting is automatically ended
config_meetingtimer: Time left for the meeting is shown as a label
config_meetingtimer_info: This applies for scheduled meetings and can be combined with Meeting auto stopped
config_admit_info: With admission enabled attendees will be in waiting room until host admits them
locales_info: From this section you make changes to the localizations or add a new ones.
locales_desc: Choose a locale from the list below. The default one is en_US and is loaded first. If you need to add another localization file choose a name and click on the Add button. It will copy the default en_US locale and you can edit it from the form in the left.
select_logout: Select "Logout" below if you are ready to end your current session.
video_attendee_info:
Organizer URL is opened in a new tab and visitor URL is stored in your clipboard, so you can send to your attendees.
You can copy it from here:
[generateLink]
error_config_save: Error while saving the config file.
error_config_add: Error while adding the config file.
error_locale_save: Error while saving the locale file.
error_locale_add: Error while adding the locale file.
new_lsv_version: There is a new version of LiveSmart Server Video:
fillin_purchase_code: Please fill in your purchase code below
product_not_activated: Your LiveSmart instance is not activated
product_updated: Your LiveSmart is updated to the latest release
product_updated_zip: Your folders are backed up in zip files, so if something is wrong you can take your old files from there.
update_location: Click here to update to the latest release
update_info:
By providing your purchase code below, you will get from our servers the latest release of LiveSmart. The system will also do a backup of your current folders, but we recommend you also to do this manually.
If setting files like /config/config.json, /server/connect.php or /locales/en_US.json are due to update, they will not be overwritten, but added as config.json.new, connect.php.new or en_US.json.new, so you can compare and update options manually.
config_loginform_info: Enable only if you have specified user credentials from the Users section. Entry form must be enabled also
config_apikey_info: Check this tutorial on how to get Google Translation API key: https://crmsupport.freshworks.com/en/support/solutions/articles/50000004404-google-translate-key
config_text_speech_lang_info: Voice language should match the language from the chat or from the translated messages
config_text_speech_chat_info: If enabled chat messages will be voiced
config_text_speech_transcribe: Text to speech from translated messages
config_text_speech_transcribe_info: If enabled and if there are translated messages, they will be voiced.
config_roomaccess: Access only rooms in the list
config_roomaccess_info: If enabled attendees can access only rooms that are previously saved and are in Rooms -> Room List
error_tenant_save: Only alphabets, numbers and underscore symbols allowed
config_saveserver_info: Recorded file is saved into /server/recordings folder. If Save whole screen is checked, the file will be saved run-time
config_filename: Filename pattern. %room% will be replaced with room name and %datetime% with the current date and time
config_terms_info: Place for URL of Terms. If filled in, checkbox will appear in the Entry form and will be mandatory.
config_autostart: Auto start, recording is started on video session starts
config_greenroom_info: Pre-meeting place, where you can check your video and audio preferences
config_videoconstraint:
Video Constraints. For more information about the constraints check here. If you expect meeting with more attendees, you can lower your camera resolution like this 
{"width": {"max": 424}, "height": {"max": 240}}
config_small_local_feed: Local video feed is locked to bottom left
config_voiceCommands_info: If enabled will start voice commands. Complete list can be seen in the documentation
virtual_backgrounds: Background with images. It reads all the images from the /img/virtual folder.
confAgentUrl: Conference agent URL is copied in your clipboard
confVisitorUrl: Conference visitor URL is copied in your clipboard
diable_attendee_video_off: Hide participant screen if video is off
diable_attendee_video_off_info: Do not show attendee screen if his video is turned off. Host can enable video from Attendees section.
config_download: Download recorded file after recording is ended
enable_chat_gpt_info: If enabled and configured, you can ask AI in your chat panel. How to setup: 1. Goto https://platform.openai.com/; 2. Create your account; 3. Generate your APIKey https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys; 4. Fill in necessary info in src/config.js; 5. Update and restart Server.js;
visitorName_enabled_info: If enabled in visitor entry form, visitor will get random name like Visitor-XX
diable_video_info: Attendees will start their session with default video disabled
need_subscribe: You need to subscribe now.
payment_enabled: Payment is enabled for this tenant
payment_enabled_info: Payments can be enabled only with Extended licenses.
enable_breakout_info: Breakout Rooms allow you to split your meeting into separate sessions.
start_personal_info: Saved or started room will use your personal details like names and avatar.
css_file_info: Update this section only if you have knowledge of CSS styling. You can edit some of the main UI attributes from the left section.
css_file_restored: Styling file is restored with default values
css_styling_info: Customize some of the main colors and backgrounds
avatars_ai_info: You can choose an avatar from here. Click on an avatar for a preview video. For more information please check HeyGen and documentation page.
openai_key_info: Steps to get the key: 1. Go to https://platform.openai.com/; 2. Create your account; 3. Generate your APIKey
openai_model_info: Defines the behavior and the model of your Open AI. Check your OpenAI account for available models
heygen_key_info: You can get the key from your account in HeyGen.com, Account - Space Settings - API
advanced_tools_info: Check the documentation and provided file in server/toolSchema.php for more information or this OpenAI article
tools_name: Name of the function. You need to have this function in server/toolCalls.php file
tools_description: Describe the condition when the funciton will be called, i.e. "Get the current weather in a given location"
tools_parameters: Parameters passed to the function, separated by comma
voices_ai_info: Choose from listed voices based on your language preferences.
ai_greeting_text: The avatar will start the conversation with this text if provided
is_context: Keep context of the conversation. If checked response may be slower
assitants_info: You can choose to use here predefined assistants from your OpenAI dashboard. If you choose an assistant from here, above advanced chat settings will not be used. Please have in mind that using assistant may lead to more credits usage and delays in the answers.
avatars_ai_paid: Paid Avatars (with subscription plan from HeyGen)
